destinations.description: You need serenity. Go walk among temples and cherry blossoms, savoring matcha and street food.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Kyoto was spared from WWII bombings due to its cultural significance and was actually removed from the atomic bomb target list.

destinations.description: You seek romance and culture. Experience world-class art, iconic architecture, and exquisite French cuisine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Eiffel Tower was originally meant to be a temporary structure for the 1889 World's Fair and was supposed to be dismantled after 20 years!

destinations.description: You want vibrant energy. Enjoy sunny beaches, tapas, and Gaudí's architecture.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Sagrada Familia has been under construction for over 140 years - longer than it took to build the Great Pyramid of Giza!

destinations.description: You want modern desert luxury. Experience futuristic architecture, desert safaris, and international cuisine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Dubai is home to the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa, which stands at 2,717 feet tall!

destinations.description: You seek adrenaline. Try bungee jumping, skiing, and fresh mountain cuisine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Queenstown is known as the birthplace of commercial bungee jumping, with the world's first commercial jump site opening in 1988!

destinations.description: You seek peace. Find it in tropical rain and ocean waves, with fresh, healthy cuisine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: In Bali, every 210 days on the Pawukon calendar is a day called Tumpek Wayang, dedicated to blessing puppets!

destinations.description: You crave mystery. Discover waterfalls and northern lights, with cozy fine dining experiences.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Iceland has no mosquitoes! It's one of the few places in the world where these insects are completely absent.

destinations.description: You crave desert adventures. Explore souks, ride camels, and enjoy tagine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Marrakech is known as the 'Red City' because of the reddish hue of its buildings and walls.

destinations.description: You want tropical modernity. Experience futuristic gardens, diverse street food, and perfect fusion of nature and city.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Singapore is a city-state with a rich cultural diversity, and it's home to over 7,000 different species of plants and animals!

destinations.description: You seek unique wildlife encounters. Meet giant tortoises, snorkel with sea lions, and explore volcanic landscapes.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Galápagos Islands are a UNESCO World Heritage Site and home to many unique species of flora and fauna!

destinations.description: You crave vibrant street life. Explore bustling markets, ornate temples, and world-famous street food.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Bangkok's full ceremonial name is the longest city name in the world, with 169 characters!

destinations.description: You desire mountain majesty. Experience pristine slopes, luxury chalets, and fondue by the fireplace.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Switzerland has enough nuclear bunkers to shelter its entire population!

destinations.description: You seek Mediterranean charm. Discover white-washed buildings, sunset views, and fresh Greek cuisine.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Santorini's unique wine varieties come from grapes grown in volcanic soil!

destinations.description: You want pure nature. Explore the world's largest rainforest, spot exotic wildlife, and experience indigenous culture.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Amazon produces about 20% of the world's oxygen!

destinations.description: You seek urban energy. Experience K-culture, night markets, and cutting-edge technology.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Seoul's subway system is one of the longest in the world and features heated seats in winter!

destinations.description: You dream of paradise. Experience overwater bungalows, crystal clear waters, and world-class diving.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Maldives is the world's lowest country, with an average ground level of 1.5 meters above sea level!

destinations.description: You want urban nature. Experience mountains meeting ocean, diverse cuisines, and outdoor adventures.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Vancouver has the longest uninterrupted waterfront path in the world, the Seawall!

destinations.description: You want desert wildlife. Experience unique desert-adapted animals, stunning landscapes, and starry skies.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Namibia is home to the world's oldest desert, the Namib, which is over 55 million years old!

destinations.description: You want desert history. Explore ancient pyramids, vibrant markets, and Nile River cruises.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only surviving wonder of the ancient world!

destinations.description: You want desert beauty. Experience red rock formations, spiritual retreats, and outdoor adventures.
destinations.funFact: Fun fact: Sedona is known for its vortex sites, believed to be centers of energy that promote healing and meditation!
